name: Mastercam Learning Edition Model
summary: Learn about .EMCAM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CNC Mastercam is a widely-used CAD/CAM package that engineers and machinists use to design and produce mechanical components. CNC Software developed the Learning Edition of Mastercam for students, teachers, and professionals to be able to try the software before purchasing it.

Since the Learning Edition of Mastercam does not allow you to save models in the default Mastercam format, CNC Software developed the EMCAM format. You can create an EMCAM file with Mastercam Learning Edition by selecting File → Save or Save As. After saving the model, you can close the file, then re-open it to continue modifying it.

description: An EMCAM file is a 3D model created by CNC Software Mastercam Learning Edition, the free trial of Mastercam computer-aided design (CAD) software. It contains one or more objects with their 3D coordinates, levels, planes, and other information. Machinists often create and edit mechanical parts with Mastercam Learning Edition to produce physical copies of the part.

instructions: You can open an EMCAM file with CNC Mastercam Learning Edition in Windows by selecting File → Open.
CNC Mastercam Learning Edition can convert EMCAM files to the following formats:
